channel.title: Photos on Alien's Den
channel.description: Recent content in Photos on Alien's Den

item.title: Nature Meditations
item.description: One of the clear themes in my photography is making humans seems small in comparison to the grandeur of Nature. One composition I keep coming back to is a human meditating on the spectacle unfolding before them. Here's a few of my favorites of that composition. Meditating over the Green River in Canyonlands National Park Meditating on Dove Lake in Tasmania on a Rainy Day
